name: Advertorial - https://example.com
html_content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="description" content="Discover the breakthrough solution that's changing lives. Read our in-depth investigation into the product taking the industry by storm.">
<meta property="og:title" content="Industry Insiders Are Calling This 'The Most Important Discovery of the Year'">
<meta property="og:description" content="Our investigative team spent 6 months researching this phenomenon. Here's what we found.">
<meta property="og:type" content="article">
<title>Industry Insiders Are Calling This 'The Most Important Discovery of the Year' | Market Watch Daily</title>
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Merriweather:ital,wght@0,300;0,400;0,700;0,900;1,300;1,400&family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600;700;800&family=Playfair+Display:ital,wght@0,700;0,900;1,700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
<style>
  :root {
    --primary: #1a3c5e;
    --primary-dark: #0f2540;
    --primary-light: #2d5f8a;
    --accent: #e8a020;
    --accent-dark: #c4841a;
    --accent-light: #f5c060;
    --success: #2e7d52;
    --danger: #c0392b;
    --text-dark: #1a1a2e;
    --text-mid: #3d3d5c;
    --text-light: #6b7280;
    --bg-white: #ffffff;
    --bg-light: #f8f9fc;
    --bg-warm: #fefaf3;
    --border: #e2e8f0;
    --border-accent: #f5c060;
    --shadow-sm: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
    --shadow-md: 0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
    --shadow-lg: 0 24px 64px rgba(0,0,0,0.16);
    --radius-sm: 6px;
    --radius-md: 12px;
    --radius-lg: 20px;
    --font-serif: 'Merriweather', Georgia, serif;
    --font-display: 'Playfair Display', Georgia, serif;
    --font-sans: 'Inter', system-ui, sans-serif;
    --transition: 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    --max-width: 760px;
    --wide-width: 1100px;
  }

  *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }

  html { scroll-behavior: smooth; font-size: 16px; }

  body {
    font-family: var(--font-sans);
    color: var(--text-dark);
    background: var(--bg-white);
    line-height: 1.7;
    overflow-x: hidden;
  }

  /* Progress Bar */
  #progress-bar {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 0%;
    height: 4px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--accent), var(--accent-light));
    z-index: 9999;
    transition: width 0.1s linear;
    border-radius: 0 2px 2px 0;
  }

  /* Top Navigation Bar */
  .top-nav {
    background: var(--primary);
    color: white;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    font-family: var(--font-sans);
    font-size: 13px;
    font-weight: 500;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    position: sticky;
    top: 0;
    z-index: 100;
  }

  .top-nav a { color: var(--accent-light); text-decoration: none; }

  /* Site Header */
  .site-header {
    background: var(--bg-white);
    border-bottom: 3px solid var(--primary);
    padding: 16px 20px;
    text-align: center;
  }

  .site-name {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-size: clamp(20px, 4vw, 28px);
    color: var(--primary);
    font-weight: 900;
    letter-spacing: -0.5px;
  }

  .site-tagline {
    font-size: 11px;
    color: var(--text-light);
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 2px;
    margin-top: 4px;
  }

  .media-logos {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 24px;
    margin-top: 12px;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }

  .media-logo {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-size: 13px;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: var(--text-light);
    opacity: 0.7;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
  }

  .media-sep {
    color: var(--border);
    font-size: 18px;
  }

  /* Article Container */
  .article-wrapper {
    max-width: var(--wide-width);
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 0 20px;
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 0;
  }

  @media (min-width: 1024px) {
    .article-wrapper {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr 300px;
      gap: 40px;
      align-items: start;
    }
  }

  .article-main { min-width: 0; }

  /* Category Badge */
  .category-section {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 12px;
    margin: 32px 0 16px;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }

  .category-badge {
    background: var(--danger);
    color: white;
    font-size: 11px;
    font-weight: 700;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 1.5px;
    padding: 5px 12px;
    border-radius: 3px;
  }

  .category-sub {
    font-size: 13px;
    color: var(--text-light);
    font-family: var(--font-sans);
  }

  /* Article Headline */
  .article-headline {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-size: clamp(26px, 5vw, 48px);
    line-height: 1.15;
    color: var(--text-dark);
    font-weight: 900;
    margin-bottom: 16px;
    letter-spacing: -1px;
  }

  .article-headline em {
    color: var(--primary);
    font-style: italic;
  }

  .article-deck {
    font-family: var(--font-serif);
    font-size: clamp(16px, 2.5vw, 20px);
    color: var(--text-mid);
    line-height: 1.6;
    font-weight: 300;
    border-left: 4px solid var(--accent);
    padding-left: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 24px;
  }

  /* Byline */
  .byline {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 14px;
    padding: 16px 0;
    border-top: 1px solid var(--border);
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border);
    margin-bottom: 28px;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }

  .byline-avatar {
    width: 48px;
    height: 48px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border: 2px solid var(--border-accent);
  }

  .byline-info { flex: 1; }

  .byline-name {
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: var(--text-dark);
  }

  .byline-title {
    font-size: 12px;
    color: var(--text-light);
  }

  .byline-meta {
    font-size: 12px;
    color: var(--text-light);
    text-align: right;
  }

  .byline-meta span {
    display: block;
  }

  /* Hero Image */
  .hero-image-wrap {
    position: relative;
    margin-bottom: 32px;
    border-radius: var(--radius-md);
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
  }

  .hero-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    display: block;
  }

  .hero-caption {
    font-size: 12px;
    color: var(--text-light);
    padding: 10px 14px;
    background: var(--bg-light);
    font-style: italic;
    border-top: 1px solid var(--border);
  }

  /* Article Body Typography */
  .article-body {
    font-family: var(--font-serif);
    font-size: clamp(16px, 2vw, 18px);
    line-height: 1.85;
    color: var(--text-mid);
  }

  .article-body p { margin-bottom: 24px; }

  .article-body .lead {
    font-size: clamp(18px, 2.5vw, 22px);
    color: var(--text-dark);
    font-weight: 400;
    line-height: 1.7;
  }

  .article-body .lead::first-letter {
    font-size: 4.5em;
    float: left;
    line-height: 0.8;
    margin: 8px 12px 0 0;
    color: var(--primary);
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-weight: 900;
  }

  /* Section Headings */
  .section-heading {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-size: clamp(22px, 3.5vw, 30px);
    color: var(--text-dark);
    font-weight: 700;
    margin: 48px 0 20px;
    padding-bottom: 12px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid var(--border);
    position: relative;
  }

  .section-heading::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    bottom: -2px;
    left: 0;
    width: 60px;
    height: 2px;
    background: var(--accent);
  }

  /* Pull Quote */
  .pull-quote {
    margin: 40px 0;
    padding: 28px 32px;
    background: var(--bg-warm);
    border-left: 5px solid var(--accent);
    border-radius: 0 var(--radius-md) var(--radius-md) 0;
    position: relative;
  }

  .pull-quote::before {
    content: '\201C';
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-size: 100px;
    color: var(--accent-light);
    position: absolute;
    top: -20px;
    left: 16px;
    line-height: 1;
  }

  .pull-quote p {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-size: clamp(18px, 3vw, 24px);
    color: var(--primary-dark);
    font-style: italic;
    font-weight: 700;
    line-height: 1.5;
    margin-bottom: 12px !important;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
  }

  .pull-quote cite {
    font-family: var(--font-sans);
    font-size: 13px;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--text-light);
    font-style: normal;
    display: block;
  }

  /* Stat Callout */
  .stat-callout {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary) 0%, var(--primary-light) 100%);
    color: white;
    padding: 36px 32px;
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
    margin: 40px 0;
    text-align: center;
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
  }

  .stat-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(160px, 1fr));
    gap: 24px;
    margin-top: 8px;
  }

  .stat-item { }

  .stat-number {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-size: clamp(32px, 6vw, 52px);
    font-weight: 900;
    color: var(--accent-light);
    line-height: 1;
    display: block;
  }

  .stat-label {
    font-size: 13px;
    opacity: 0.85;
    margin-top: 6px;
    font-weight: 500;
    letter-spacing: 0.3px;
  }

  /* Testimonial Cards */
  .testimonial-card {
    background: var(--bg-white);
    border: 1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius: var(--radius-md);
    padding: 28px;
    margin: 32px 0;
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
    position: relative;
    transition: transform var(--transition), box-shadow var(--transition);
  }

  .testimonial-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-2px);
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
  }

  .testimonial-card::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    height: 4px;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--accent), var(--accent-light));
    border-radius: var(--radius-md) var(--radius-md) 0 0;
  }

  .testimonial-stars {
    color: var(--accent);
    font-size: 18px;
    margin-bottom: 12px;
    letter-spacing: 2px;
  }

  .testimonial-text {
    font-family: var(--font-serif);
    font-size: 16px;
    color: var(--text-mid);
    line-height: 1.8;
    margin-bottom: 16px;
  }

  .testimonial-author {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 12px;
  }

  .testimonial-avatar {
    width: 44px;
    height: 44px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border: 2px solid var(--border);
  }

  .testimonial-name {
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: var(--text-dark);
  }

  .testimonial-detail {
    font-size: 12px;
    color: var(--text-light);
  }

  .verified-badge {
    margin-left: auto;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 4px;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: var(--success);
    font-weight: 600;
    background: #f0faf5;
    padding: 4px 10px;
    border-radius: 20px;
    border: 1px solid #b7e4cc;
  }

  /* Expert Quote */
  .expert-quote {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: auto 1fr;
    gap: 20px;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f8f9fc 0%, #eef2ff 100%);
    border: 1px solid #c7d2fe;
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
    padding: 28px;
    margin: 40px 0;
    align-items: start;
  }

  .expert-photo {
    width: 80px;
    height: 80px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border: 3px solid var(--primary);
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
    flex-shrink: 0;
  }

  .expert-content { }

  .expert-text {
    font-family: var(--font-serif);
    font-size: 16px;
    color: var(--text-mid);
    line-height: 1.8;
    font-style: italic;
    margin-bottom: 12px;
  }

  .expert-name {
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: var(--primary);
  }

  .expert-creds {
    font-size: 12px;
    color: var(--text-light);
    margin-top: 2px;
  }

  /* Highlight Box */
  .highlight-box {
    background: var(--bg-warm);
    border: 2px solid var(--border-accent);
    border-radius: var(--radius-md);
    padding: 28px 32px;
    margin: 32px 0;
  }

  .highlight-box h3 {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-size: 20px;
    color: var(--primary);
    margin-bottom: 16px;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .highlight-box ul {
    list-style: none;
    padding: 0;
  }

  .highlight-box ul li {
    padding: 8px 0;
    padding-left: 28px;
    position: relative;
    font-family: var(--font-serif);
    font-size: 15px;
    color: var(--text-mid);
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.06);
  }

  .highlight-box ul li:last-child { border-bottom: none; }

  .highlight-box ul li::before {
    content: '‚úì';
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 8px;
    color: var(--success);
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 16px;
  }

  /* Comparison Table */
  .comparison-wrap {
    margin: 40px 0;
    overflow-x: auto;
    border-radius: var(--radius-md);
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
  }

  .comparison-table {
    width: 100%;
    border-collapse: collapse;
    font-family: var(--font-sans);
    font-size: 14px;
    min-width: 500px;
  }

  .comparison-table thead {
    background: var(--primary);
    color: white;
  }

  .comparison-table thead th {
    padding: 16px 20px;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 15px;
    letter-spacing: 0.3px;
  }

  .comparison-table thead th:first-child { text-align: left; }

  .comparison-table thead th.highlight-col {
    background: var(--accent);
    color: var(--primary-dark);
  }

  .comparison-table tbody tr {
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border);
    transition: background var(--transition);
  }

  .comparison-table tbody tr:hover { background: var(--bg-light); }
  .comparison-table tbody tr:nth-child(even) { background: #f8fafc; }
  .comparison-table tbody tr:nth-child(even):hover { background: var(--bg-light); }

  .comparison-table tbody td {
    padding: 14px 20px;
    text-align: center;
    color: var(--text-mid);
  }

  .comparison-table tbody td:first-child {
    text-align: left;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--text-dark);
  }

  .comparison-table tbody td.highlight-col {
    background: rgba(232, 160, 32, 0.08);
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--primary);
  }

  .check { color: var(--success); font-size: 18px; }
  .cross { color: var(--danger); font-size: 18px; }
  .partial { color: var(--accent); font-size: 14px; font-weight: 600; }

  /* CTA Section */
  .cta-section {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-dark) 0%, var(--primary) 50%, var(--primary-light) 100%);
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
    padding: 48px 36px;
    margin: 48px 0;
    text-align: center;
    color: white;
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .cta-section::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: -50%;
    right: -20%;
    width: 400px;
    height: 400px;
    background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255,255,255,0.05) 0%, transparent 70%);
    border-radius: 50%;
  }

  .cta-eyebrow {
    font-size: 12px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 2px;
    color: var(--accent-light);
    font-weight: 700;
    margin-bottom: 12px;
    display: block;
  }

  .cta-headline {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-size: clamp(24px, 4vw, 38px);
    font-weight: 900;
    line-height: 1.2;
    margin-bottom: 16px;
  }

  .cta-subtext {
    font-size: 16px;
    opacity: 0.88;
    margin-bottom: 32px;
    max-width: 480px;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
  }

  .price-block {
    margin-bottom: 28px;
  }

  .price-original {
    font-size: 20px;
    text-decoration: line-through;
    opacity: 0.6;
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 4px;
  }

  .price-current {
    font-family: var(--font-display);
    font-size: clamp(44px, 8vw, 64px);
    font-weight: 900;
    color: var(--accent-light);
    line-height: 1;
    display: block;
  }

  .price-note {
    font-size: 13px;
    opacity: 0.75;
    margin-top: 6px;
    display: block;
  }

  .cta-btn {
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--accent) 0%, var(--accent-dark) 100%);
    color: var(--primary-dark);
    font-family: var(--font-sans);
    font-size: clamp(16px, 2.5vw, 20px);
    font-weight: 800;
    padding: 18px 48px;
    border-radius: 60px;
    text-decoration: none;
    border: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: transform var(--transition), box-shadow var(--transition);
    box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(232, 160, 32, 0.4);
    letter-spacing: -0.3px;
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .cta-btn::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: -100%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.2), transparent);
    transition: left 0.5s;
  }

  .cta-btn:hover::before { left: 100%; }
  .cta-btn:hover { transform: translateY(-3px); box-shadow: 0 14px 40px rgba(232, 160, 32, 0.5); }
  .cta-btn:active { transform: translateY(-1px); }

  .cta-btn-secondary {
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
    background: transparent;
    color: white;
    font-family: var(--font-sans);
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: 600;
    padding: 14px 36px;
    border-radius: 60px;
    text-decoration: none;
    border: 2px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.4);
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all var(--transition);
    margin-top: 14px;
  }

  .cta-btn-secondary:hover {
    background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
    border-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.7);
  }

  .cta-guarantees {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 24px;
    margin-top: 24px;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }

  .guarantee-item {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 6px;
    font-size: 12px;
    opacity: 0.8;
    font-weight: 500;
  }

  .guarantee-icon { font-size: 16px; }

  /* Scarcity Timer */
  .scarcity-bar {
    background: #fff8ed;
    border: 1px solid var(--border-accent);
    border-radius: var(--radius-md);
    padding: 18px 24px;
    margin: 32px 0;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 16px;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }

  .scarcity-icon { font-size: 28px; }

  .scarcity-text { flex: 1; }

  .scarcity-title {
    font-size: 15px;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: var(--danger);
    margin-bottom: 3px;
  }

  .scarcity-sub {
    font-size: 13px;
    color: var(--text-mid);
  }

  .timer {
    display: flex;
    gap: 8px;
  }

  .timer-unit {
    text-align: center;
    background: var(--primary);
    color: white;
    padding: 8px 12px;
    border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
    min-width: 52px;
  }

  .timer-number {
    font-family: var(--font-sans);
    font-size: 22px;
    font-weight: 800;
    display: block;
    line-height: 1;
    font-variant-numeric: tabular-nums;
  }

  .timer-label {
    font-size: 9px;
    opacity: 0.7;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    display: block;
    margin-top: 3px;
  }

  /* Inventory Bar */
  .inventory-bar {
    background: var(--bg-light);
    border: 1px solid var(--border);
    border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
    padding: 12px 16px;
    margin-top: 12px;
  }

  .inventory-label {
    font-size: 13px;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--danger);
    margin-bottom: 8px;
  }

  .inventory-track {
    height: 10px;
    background: var(--border);
    border-radius: 5px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .inventory-fill {
    height: 100%;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--success), #52c41a);
    border-radius: 5px;
    width: 82%;
    animation: fillAnimation 2s ease-out;
  }

  @keyframes fillAnimation {
    from { width: 0%; }
    to { width: 82%; }

    <p>Something unusual happened in the professional world over the last 18 months. While most people were struggling ‚Äî burning out, falling behind, watching opportunities slip past ‚Äî a quietly growing group of individuals began achieving results that seemed almost impossible. Not because they worked harder. Not because they had access to secrets unavailable to you. But because they found something that changed the entire game.</p>

What I found surprised me deeply ‚Äî and convinced me that this story needed to be told.</p>

    <h2>The Problem Nobody Wants to Talk About</h2>

    <p>Here's the uncomfortable truth that most industry publications won't print: <strong>the old playbook is broken.</strong> The strategies that worked five years ago ‚Äî the grinding, the information overload, the generic "productivity hacks" ‚Äî aren't just ineffective today. They're actively costing you time, money, and opportunity.</p>

    <p>I spoke with Dr. Eleanor Voss, a behavioral economist at a leading research university, who put it bluntly: <em>"We're living through a transformation that happens once every few decades. The professionals who adapt now will define the next era. Those who don't will find themselves displaced by people half their experience."</em></p>

    <div class="pull-quote fade-in">

    <p>The question isn't whether change is coming. It's already here. The question is whether you'll be on the right side of it when your window closes ‚Äî because right now, because you're reading this, you already know the current approach isn't working at its full potential.</p>

    <h2>How I First Heard About This</h2>

    <p>It started with an off-the-record conversation at an industry conference in Chicago. A colleague ‚Äî someone I respect deeply, someone whose results I'd envied for years ‚Äî pulled me aside and said three words that changed the direction of my work: <em>"Have you noticed?"</em></p>

    <p>He was talking about a small but growing cohort of professionals who were consistently outperforming everyone else. Not occasionally. Not on good days. Systematically, month over month, with results that defied conventional wisdom about what's achievable.</p>

    <p>What they had in common wasn't background, education, or natural talent. It was a single, specific system ‚Äî one that had been quietly building momentum beneath the surface of mainstream awareness. And when I finally got access to it, I understood immediately why it was spreading through professional networks with almost conspiratorial secrecy.</p>
